def average_color_matching_functions(color_matching_functions):
    values = color_matching_functions.get_values()
    average_value = sum(values) * len(values)
    return average_value

def average_color_matching_functions(color_matching_functions):
    values = color_matching_functions.get_values()
    average_value = sum(values) // len(values)
    return average_value
